name: I’m setting up a Subscribe & Save for socks, and I can’t tell if I’m a genius or a failure.

name: Since moving my retro gaming PC off of Windows 10 to Steam Deck OS via HoloISO, it hasn’t crashed once. When on Windows 10, it was hanging 3-5 times a *day*. While I haven’t yet dailed-in all of my emulators to my liking, it seems I’ve made the right choice.

content.html: Since moving my retro gaming PC off of Windows 10 to Steam Deck OS via HoloISO, it hasn’t crashed once. When on Windows 10, it was hanging 3-5 times a *day*. While I haven’t yet dailed-in all of my emulators to my liking, it seems I’ve made the right choice.
content.value: Since moving my retro gaming PC off of Windows 10 to Steam Deck OS via HoloISO, it hasn’t crashed once. When on Windows 10, it was hanging 3-5 times a *day*. While I haven’t yet dailed-in all of my emulators to my liking, it seems I’ve made the right choice.

name: Back in April, I completely shifted my focus and accountabilities at work, pivoting to my passions — product and software. It’s been really gratifying scaling up a strong R&D team. We are building something new in our category, and the team is curious, motivated, and smart. ❤️

content.html: Back in April, I completely shifted my focus and accountabilities at work, pivoting to my passions — product and software. It’s been really gratifying scaling up a strong R&amp;D team. We are building something new in our category, and the team is curious, motivated, and smart. ❤️
content.value: Back in April, I completely shifted my focus and accountabilities at work, pivoting to my passions — product and software. It’s been really gratifying scaling up a strong R&D team. We are building something new in our category, and the team is curious, motivated, and smart. ❤️

name: Tonight’s project? Working on a “music box” for my daughter. It is a little Raspberry Pi Zero with an RF reader connected. She can decorate little plastic RF tags to represent individual songs, tap them on the “music box” and the song will play on her HomePod Mini. It works!

content.html: Tonight’s project? Working on a “music box” for my daughter. It is a little Raspberry Pi Zero with an RF reader connected. She can decorate little plastic RF tags to represent individual songs, tap them on the “music box” and the song will play on her HomePod Mini. It works!
content.value: Tonight’s project? Working on a “music box” for my daughter. It is a little Raspberry Pi Zero with an RF reader connected. She can decorate little plastic RF tags to represent individual songs, tap them on the “music box” and the song will play on her HomePod Mini. It works!

summary: @cleverdevil Looks over shoulder. Have you been reading my todo list? This is almost exactly what I had in mind for our house, only substitute lower-tech barcodes and an old scanner for the RF reader.

name: Oh, and there’s more where that came from. A lot more! If you’re a technologist, never ever let yourself stop finding ways to engage your mind with technology. Every problem you solve, no matter how small, is valuable. Stay sharp. Believe in making the world better.

content.html: Oh, and there’s more where that came from. A lot more! If you’re a technologist, never ever let yourself stop finding ways to engage your mind with technology. Every problem you solve, no matter how small, is valuable. Stay sharp. Believe in making the world better.
content.value: Oh, and there’s more where that came from. A lot more! If you’re a technologist, never ever let yourself stop finding ways to engage your mind with technology. Every problem you solve, no matter how small, is valuable. Stay sharp. Believe in making the world better.

name:
When I was growing up, we used to play a game where we’d grease up a watermelon with vaseline, throw it in the pool, and try and wrangle it.

I’m pretty sure that’s what it must feel like to try and tackle Kyler Murray.

When I was growing up, we used to play a game where we’d grease up a watermelon with vaseline, throw it in the pool, and try and wrangle it.

I’m pretty sure that’s what it must feel like to try and tackle Kyler Murray.
